folder.name: Data Flows : Cases & Deaths Data Transformations

scriptLines: SrcCasesAndDeaths filter(continent == 'Europe' && not( isNull( country_code ) )) ~> FilterEuropeOnly
SrcDimDate derive(ecdc_year_week = concat( year, '-W', lpad( week_of_year, 2, '0' ) )) ~> DerivedECDCYearWeek
pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k']),
